text: The Mochuan River () is a right-bank tributary of the upper Xiang River in Xin'an County, Guangxi, China. The river rises in the west of Panhuang Temple () in Mochuan Township () and flows south to north, joining the Xiang at Qukou () of Yujiang Village (), Xiangli Town (). The Mochuan River has a length of ; its drainage basin covers an area of .The tributaries of Xiang River: dongnanshan.com or tanzhijian.com ==References== Category:Rivers of Hunan
title: Mochuan River
